argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hosd1.2 | |- T : ~H --> ~H |
| 2 |  | hosd1.3 | |- U : ~H --> ~H |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_honegsubi | |- ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = ( T -op U ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqeq1i | |- ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = 0hop <-> ( T -op U ) = 0hop ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = 0hop -> ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) +op U ) = ( 0hop +op U ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ( T -op U ) = 0hop -> ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) +op U ) = ( 0hop +op U ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 8 |  | #P_homulcl | |- ( ( -u 1 e. CC /\ U : ~H --> ~H ) -> ( -u 1 .op U ) : ~H --> ~H ) |
| 9 | 7, 2, 8 | #P_mp2an | |- ( -u 1 .op U ) : ~H --> ~H |
| 10 | 1, 9, 2 | #P_hoadd32i | |- ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) +op U ) = ( ( T +op U ) +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 9 | #P_hoaddassi | |- ( ( T +op U ) +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = ( T +op ( U +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) ) |
| 12 | 2, 2 | #P_honegsubi | |- ( U +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = ( U -op U ) |
| 13 | 2 | #P_hodidi | |- ( U -op U ) = 0hop |
| 14 | 12, 13 | #P_eqtri | |- ( U +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = 0hop |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( T +op ( U +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) ) = ( T +op 0hop ) |
| 16 | 1 | #P_hoaddid1i | |- ( T +op 0hop ) = T |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_eqtri | |- ( T +op ( U +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) ) = T |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_eqtri | |- ( ( T +op U ) +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) = T |
| 19 | 10, 18 | #P_eqtri | |- ( ( T +op ( -u 1 .op U ) ) +op U ) = T |
| 20 |  | #P_ho0f | |- 0hop : ~H --> ~H |
| 21 | 20, 2 | #P_hoaddcomi | |- ( 0hop +op U ) = ( U +op 0hop ) |
| 22 | 2 | #P_hoaddid1i | |- ( U +op 0hop ) = U |
| 23 | 21, 22 | #P_eqtri | |- ( 0hop +op U ) = U |
| 24 | 6, 19, 23 | #P_3eqtr3g | |- ( ( T -op U ) = 0hop -> T = U ) |
| 25 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( T = U -> ( T -op U ) = ( U -op U ) ) |
| 26 | 25, 13 | #P_syl6eq | |- ( T = U -> ( T -op U ) = 0hop ) |
| 27 | 24, 26 | #P_impbii | |- ( ( T -op U ) = 0hop <-> T = U ) |
